name: Dodo vs The Thunder Cloud
description:
Dodo vs The Thunder Cloud is a platformer with Artificial intelligence made for the Wowie jam 4.0 in 84 hrs. 

If you play this game please leave some feedback it will help me alot

Let The Fun Begin!!!

How To Play

-Use "A" and "D" or arrow keys to move 

-Use "space" to jump

Instruction

-The THUNDER CLOUD is an AI which will try to kill you by predicting your next move

-The AI gets smarter over time

-Collect the falling bullets to shoot

-Destroy the THUNDER CLOUD to WIN
